column5: Villa # 4 features a fun black and white decor, King size bed, deluxe linens, private bath, & comfortable seating area. This Villa features adjoining doors to Villaif you opt to have friends or family stay nearby. MAXIMUM OCCUPANCY 2 PEOPLE. All Villas provide free Wifi, Cable TV, private coffee bar, toiletries, plush robes, private entrance, parking, and access to the tasting room within walking distance.
